title: East India Cotton association Prices -September 24 2019

East India Cotton association Prices -September 24 2019

Commodities 1 hour ago (Sep 24, 2019 18:21)

© Reuters. East India Cotton association Prices -September 24 2019 BANGALORE, September 24 (Reuters) - The following are the daily Cotton prices supplied by Indian based East India Cotton Association. The prices are in Indian Rupees per Candy (355.62 Kgs).
